titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to provide a grant to the State of New Jersey for the construction of a memorial to the New Jersey victims of the terrorist attacks of September 11, 2001.
To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to provide a grant to the State of New Jersey for the construction of a memorial to the New Jersey victims of the terrorist attacks of September 11, 2001.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands.

bill.summary: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to provide a grant to the State of New Jersey for the construction of a memorial in Liberty State Park in Jersey City, New Jersey, to the New Jersey victims of the terrorist attacks on September 11, 2001.
